channel.title: Hello-World on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hello-World on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello World!

This is my first content page for my site.

My name is Taylor, and I am a mechanical engineer turned software engineer with an interest in in backend development, terminal emulation, and more recently, how to host & serve static content over the web. You can read more about me here.

This site will be a place to showcase my various projects and assorted things I find interesting. I have no idea how often I will be posting, but expect an assortment of topics and content.
item.content:
Hello World!

This is my first content page for my site.

My name is Taylor, and I am a mechanical engineer turned software engineer with an interest in in backend development, terminal emulation, and more recently, how to host & serve static content over the web. You can read more about me here.

This site will be a place to showcase my various projects and assorted things I find interesting. I have no idea how often I will be posting, but expect an assortment of topics and content.
